attributes.action: suspend all foreign aid to Sudan,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That all foreign aid to Sudan be suspended until it apologises to and compensates Gillian Gibbons, for the barbaric decision to imprison her over an innocent cultural misunderstanding

rejection.details:
Mrs Gibbons has now been released.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stopsudanaid/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
